SageTVPlugin.Name: Sage Job Queue (SJQ) UI
SageTVPlugin.Description: Adds a user-friendly interface to Sage Job Queue v4.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
4.00.20110227: - Added support for mapping directories on Clients. - Fixed formatting error that caused the Commit button to go off the bottom of the Create task menu. - Fixed a bug that would cause Task to not be reassigned to Events if the user removed the Task and then did not commit the change.
4.00.20110115: - Fixed a bug that caused the Tasks to disappear from the Queued Tasks and Completed Tasks menus (issue 281). - Fixed a bug that prevented user from being able to unassign a Task from an Event if the Task no longer was supported by any Client (issue 280). - Changed Record dialog so user is not forced to assign manual recording to an event (issue 275). - Removed the scrollbar from the Setup menu and placed it in a separate Plugin (issue 276).
4.00.20101219: - Fix problem that arose when too many items were put into the Setup Menu (issue 269). - Fix problem with data input dialog if not in Numeric Text Entry mode (issue 270). - Improve appearance of metadata display dialog (issue 266). - Add scroll bar on Choose Tasks for Events dialog (issue 265).
4.00.20101213: - Fix for incorrect parsing of crontab entry on Task Editor Menu. - Fix for incorrect ClientInFocus on Clients Menu. - Added cron4j dependency to STVi manifest.
4.00.20101128: - First public beta.
